Nightlight::

"How????"said Nightlight while she aimed other energy ball towards 
Vampirtron


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "try and contain him!" Kenzo said loudly.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight:
> > 
> > Nightlight screamed scared at time that she moved backwards and  
> > fired an blue energy ball against Vampirtron. She wans't sure if 
that 
> > would be enough to stun him
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > 
> > > As the Vampirtron jumped at Nightlight, the Maximal Commander 
> > reacted quickly. He jumped at between them at Vampirtron. He was 
> > attempting to tackle Vampirtron to the ground.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: DONT TOUCH HER!!!
> > >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> > >   From: Lestat Lioncourt 
> > >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
> > >   Sent: Saturday, August 17, 2002 6:22 AM
> > >   Subject: Re: Artifact 1
> > > 
> > > 
> > >   (I'm gonna be gone for the next 4 days, so basically, you can 
do 
> > whatever experiments you want on Vampirtron, as long as they 
don't 
> > alter him too much...) 
> > > 
> > >   Vampirtron: 
> > > 
> > >        He was fully aware of all that happened, hyperkeenly 
too. 
> > Time had seemed to slow for him. 
> > > 
> > >        "No more time left in the world...I need to FEED!!!" He 
> > yelled, then seemed to pass out. On instinct programming he 
> > transformed into robot mode, and lied there, unmoving, eyes shut. 
> > There were no more energon surges going through him, but he 
seemed 
> > quite dead. 
> > > 
> > >        That's when the hunger took over, his eyes whipped open, 
to 
> > reveal a new colour. His optics, which were normally light blue, 
had 
> > turned a frightening blood red. The colour almost illuminated the 
> > room. When Vampirtron spole, it was with a slight modification to 
his 
> > vocal center, his voice was deeper and almost seemed to echo. 
> > > 
> > >        "Activating Mayfair Recording," He said, in a very flat 
> > tone. Then his voice picked up emotions that weren't his 
own, "Ahh, 
> > greetings," He said in a chipper voice, "I see you have found my 
pet. 
> > Well, isn't this a golden opportunity? I think it is. What can I 
tell 
> > you about Experiment 666? Well, he has no spark for one, but 
> > ironically, one of the most compasionate transformers I've ever 
met. 
> > How does he stay alive? Well, he feeds on other transformers. How 
> > does he make this process happen? Well, if this recording has 
been 
> > activated, I think you're all going to get a personal 
demonstration." 
> > Vampirtron sat unmoving still, "End of Mayfair Recording." 
> > > 
> > >        Vampirtron sat still for a few more seconds, but then 
leaped 
> > up towards the nearest person, Nightlight. He opened his mouth 
wide 
> > in midair, and huge canine teeth extended, with little drills at 
the 
> > end. His claws extended and he reached out to grab her... 
> > > 
> > >    RoboRick007 wrote: 
> > > 
> > >     : :  Rodimus Prime : :
> > > 
> > >     Rodimus Prime: Ok, just tell me what you need when you need 
it. 
> > I want to see Vampirtron not in pain.
